title: Unexpected Error while trying to change/Edit/Pick Masteries.
body:
Hi all,

wanted to see if anyone could help me with my issue. Whenever I try to change/edit or pick masteries from the lobby screen I keep getting this error.

Error

An unexpected Error has occurred

It continues going on to say its sent a report to the server and so on and to check the forums for solutions which ive been doing for about 2 hours solid. I have to play games it seems with no masteries LOL

Ill post a pic of the error maybe someone can give me a fix. I tried about all I can find on google and trolling the forums.

http://imgur.com/1NJkz42

Cheers,

Syn

replies.body: hey this exact same thing is happening to me.. its fucking bullshit how you just start with no talents.. ffs riot why has your game always had such shitty programming
Hey there, a bit late but I was having trouble with this too lately and found that deleting all the mastery pages I had fixed it for me, hope this helps if you're still having this issue!

I am leaving a comment on 10/11/16, and I was having this issue for two days. I deleted a few mastery pages and it seems to be good as new. 

Thank you!!

Deleting them worked!
My guess is that because I just started playing after not playing for about 1 year, all the masteries changed completely, and it caused issues with the old pages...

Hey xSynx,

Could you try [repairing your client, and if it doesn't work, force a repatch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6)? Let me know if that helps.

-DTN

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=emlJVOqg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-24T19:08:23.993+0000)
>
> Hey xSynx,
> 
> Could you try [repairing your client, and if it doesn't work, force a repatch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6)? Let me know if that helps.
> 
> -DTN


Already tried that mate, didn't work. Pretty much tried everything I could find on google and an hours worth of forum post trolling.

Have you tried [changing to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)? this may help.

If not, you may want to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=emlJVOqg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-25T00:59:34.533+0000)
>
> Have you tried [changing to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)? this may help.
> 
> If not, you may want to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance.


Good effort on replying but its not a DNS issue im afraid, it seems to be client side or server side.

I think it may be something to do with the RADS files but I don't want to go deleting anything I shouldn't. If anyone can give me info on the RADS files id be grateful!
What files are you considering deleting?

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=emlJVOqg,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-25T02:01:35.346+0000)
>
> What files are you considering deleting?

Possibly LoL_Air_Client and something else. I read a post somewhere about 2 folders you can delete from RADS/Projects
If you've already tried completely uninstalling and reinstalling your game then this will be no different.
Well im pretty much out of ideas, might have to drop support a message.
